response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its high value and exceptional quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a price that is significantly below its market value. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be making a wise investment that promises long-term benefits. Please let us know your decision soon so we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
